name: Oren
description: Oren can drum a beat on anything—even a lunchbox!

name: Raddy
description: Raddy’s rhythms are so spicy, they sizzle!

name: Clukr
description: Clukr lays down beats with robotic precision.

name: Fun Bot
description: Fun Bot powers every party with non-stop bass.

name: Vineria
description: Vineria grooves like vines dancing in the wind.

name: Gray
description: Gray turns silence into cinematic sound magic.

name: Brud
description: Brud adds the ‘whoosh’ to your coolest transitions.

name: Garnold
description: Garnold’s glitch effects are legendary in the remix world.

name: OWAKCX
description: OWAKCX warps sound like a sonic wizard.

name: Sky
description: Sky adds shimmer and echo that feel like flying.

name: MrSun
description: MrSun shines through every melody with joy.

name: Durple
description: Durple’s dreamy melodies sound like cotton candy skies.

name: MrTree
description: MrTree’s tunes grow strong and peaceful like a forest.

name: Simon
description: Simon composes melodies that make everyone smile.

name: Tunner
description: Tunner's melodies are timeless like a vinyl record.

name: Funcomputer
description: Funcomputer sings in autotune like a pixelated popstar.

name: Wenda
description: Wenda’s voice floats like a feather in the air.

name: Pinki
description: Pinki belts out big vocals with tiny diva energy!

name: Jevin
description: Jevin sings like a synthwave lullaby.

name: Black
description: Black’s deep voice sounds like midnight poetry.
